name: Block slide (insert cool games, COOLE_man8)
description:
this is our first game on unity, and we will make many more!
it is a very hard game but it begins easy, we will add an endless mode soon and a couple of levels. then it is finished! We might also put in suggestions so if you want a feature, suggest it.

we hope you like the game as much as we do. 

controls: a to go left, d to go right. it is as simple as that.
